name: WoodyPuzzleBlock
description:
Playing
- Drag and drop block into right place. There are many brick shapes to pick up.
- Game will be over if there are no room for any the shapes below the grid.
- When a line is full filled, you get score
- You cannot rotate when playing
- You can think as much as you want before pick up one.
- NO limited time.
Features
Free to play
Light background music.
Woody puzzle block, simple and smooth.
The pleasure of eliminating wood blocks.
The joy of the highest score.
For players who are always looking for ways to expand your intelligence of numbers, logic or pictures, we would love to recommend this game as your partner, which can help you relax and increase your intelligence.
